root.message: The COVERAGE field for indicator 9-3-1, translated into en
root.data:
Data availability:

Data for around 70 economies were collected

Time series:

Data are provided on very irregular basis. Data available from annual industrial surveys show yearly frequency, surveys on small and medium enterprises are conducted either irregularly or with a given time lag (for instance once in five years).

Disaggregation:

Data can be disaggregated by manufacturing sub-sectors
